title: Array Indexing and Slicing
description: Write a program that takes an array of integers as input and prints the sum of all elements at even indices and the sum of all elements at odd indices. Additionally, the program should print the first three elements of the array and the last three elements of the array.
sample_output:
Sum of even indices: 30
Sum of odd indices: 25
First three elements: [1, 2, 3]
Last three elements: [8, 9, 10]
